name: Downed Jump
description:
It won't be easy or a straight line, But know I will be there for you

Downed Jump is based on the journey of Max, a grieving 20-something as he forays into an unknown landscape looking for a way out. 

The game is  an audio-visual platformer where sound plays as much as a role as sight and sometimes is the only cue available to guide you. The game is meant to be difficult and expects you to understand its cues and use its own limitations and 'glitches' to go further perhaps even exploit them to master it as you venture forth to the end...

Controls

W, A, S, D- Movement

Space- Jump

Art, level design, most coding - RyanSP

Music, sfx, sound coding - Papabirb
